name: OR_LNLG_VISTOR_TMS
description: The OR_LNLG_VISTOR_TMS table stores the in/out time information of the visitors who visited the surgery.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the record that contains the information about a single visitor who visited the surgery.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.  Each line contains in/out time for the visitor. A visitor may have multiple in/out times if he/she entered and exited the surgery multiple times. Each in/out time pair is stored as a separate line.

columns.name: VISITOR_ST_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented this visitor's start time.

columns.name: VISITOR_ST_DOCU_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: VISITOR_ET_DOCU_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the EMP user who documented this visitor's end time.

columns.name: VISITOR_ET_DOCU_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
